name: L-valine,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
definition: L-Valine + 2 Oxygen + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> (E)-2-Methylpropanal oxime + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + CO2 + 3 H2O
comment: three-step reaction (see R10031+R10032+R10033) The enzyme can also accept L-isoleucine as substrate, with a lower activity.(1.14.14.39) 3step reaction (similar to R00730+R04460+R07190)
